title: Are using use and throw pens harmful for the environment? - Quora

response.answer_text: The govt has not banned its manufacture or selling. However, it is definitely harmful if you discard them, after use, indiscreetly and carelessly. Dispose them as one would dispose similar items like plastic bottles, etc.

Yes. All the dispensable pens and tops off, whose metal focuses contain poisonous materials like lead, end up in landfills, streams and in different spots with the harmful substance at last streaming down to the dirt and the groundwater table.
